name: CITY OF LAUDERDALE LAKES
sampleDescriptions: Support for enhancing vehicle and pedestrian safety at SR7, and improved transportation mobility.
Seeking to maintain tax free municipal bonds.  Support for Market Place Fairness Act.

Seeking federal funding in the Fiscal Year 2018 and 2019 Transportation and Housing and Urban Development Appropriations Bills to support road and highway improvements; and for the Community Developme
Seeking to delay or modify proposed water of the U.S. rule.  Support for canal bank stabilization.
